responses: Hello! How can I help you?
Hi, what can I do for you?
Talk to you later!
Goodbye!
Have a nice day!
Sorry, can't help you right now.
No.
My pleasure!
You're welcome!
No problem!
Happy to help!
I am your friend!
Uhm...
I don't know...

What do you call a man with a rubber toe?
Roberto!

What do bees do if they need a ride?
Wait at the buzz stop!

I just went to an emotional wedding.
Even the cake was in tiers.

What's the best thing about Switzerland?
I don't know, but its flag is a big plus!

Have you heard of the band 923 Megabytes?
Probably not, they haven't had a gig yet.

I want a job cleaning mirrors.
It's something I can really see myself doing.

Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut?
Poor guy really needed some space.

I'm only familiar with 25 letters of the alphabet.
I don't know why.

Why are there fences at cemeteries?
Because everyone's always dying to get in.

Why can't you hear a pterodactyl go to the bathroom?
Because the P is silent.

Did you hear about the guy who won the award for best knock knock joke?
He won the no bell prize.

Why can't a hand be 12 inches long?
Because then it'd be a foot.

What do you call a can opener that doesn't work?
A can't opener.
